definition[0]: if similar things diverge, they develop in different ways and so are no longer similar
example[0]: The two species diverged millions of years ago.
example[1]: Global growth rates are diverging markedly.
definition[1]: if opinions, interests etc diverge, they are different from each other
example[2]: Here his views diverged from hers.
definition[2]: if two lines or paths diverge, they separate and go in different directions
definition[3]: if two or more rates of interest, unemployment etc diverge, the difference between them becomes larger
example[3]: Business cycles in different EU countries currently diverge significantly.
